sentences.english: Since being residentially different, title is also each and not identical.
sentences.chinese: 由于居住地不同，称谓也各不相同。

sentences.english: What does the research say about how these terms affect children?
sentences.chinese: 有关这些称谓对孩子的影响，研究报告怎么说的？

sentences.english: This text is mainly to compare the appellation of relatives in two different languages.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要对两种不同语言亲属称谓进行了对比。

sentences.english: Hindus are taught that “truth is one, the sages give it various names.”
sentences.chinese: 印度教训示“真理唯一，哲人以不同名字称谓之。”

sentences.english: Khan was a ruler under a well-developed regime in North Asia from the 4 th century on.
sentences.chinese: 可汗是四世纪以后北亚民族高级政治体首领的称谓。

sentences.english: Close relatives of the monarch of the United Kingdom are known by the appellation The Royal Family.
sentences.chinese: 近亲国王联合王国所知的称谓王室。

sentences.english: Addresses play a rule of stepping stone in social communications.
sentences.chinese: 社会交往中，称谓词扮演着敲门砖的作用。

sentences.english: Chinese language appellation system takes the relatives appellation terms as the base.
sentences.chinese: 汉语称谓以亲属称谓为基点。

sentences.english: Chinese language appellation system takes the relatives appellation terms as the base.
sentences.chinese: 汉语称谓以亲属称谓为基点。

sentences.english: Kinsfolk appellation is the kinsfolk system reflection in language.
sentences.chinese: 亲属称谓词是亲属制度在语言中的反映。

sentences.english: Kinsfolk appellation is the kinfolks system reflection in language.
sentences.chinese: 亲属称谓是亲属制度在语言中的反应。

sentences.english: The narrative arc, as I put it.
sentences.chinese: 生命叙事线，这是我对它的称谓。

sentences.english: Lazurite, an ancient name for Chinese colored glass.
sentences.chinese: 琉璃，中国玻璃古称谓之一。

sentences.english: Zang-organ and fu-organ, are kinds of special names called in TCM.
sentences.chinese: 脏腑是中医概念中特有的有差别的器官称谓。

sentences.english: Indifference to precision is nowhere more flagrantly manifested than in the superscription of epistles.
sentences.chinese: 漠视精确，在书信的称谓上最明显。

sentences.english: The socialization of the terms of address of relatives can reflect the customs of an ethnic group.
sentences.chinese: 亲属称谓社会化也会反映一个民族的称谓风俗。

definition: alternative name/to refer to sth by another name/antonomasia
to address sb directly by name (idiom)/to address sb by name without using an honorific title (indicating either familiarity or overfamiliarity)
name (of a person or thing)/CL:個|个[ge4]
name of job in Imperial bureaucracy/official position
